addText.text: Dear participant, Welcome to our study! We are a company called Flying Fish Research-Neurosketch, which performs research for companies. Here, we are interested in understanding how people like different beer bottle designs. We will ask you questions about different new beers. Your participation is very important to us. Please press ' Continue'.
When stimuli are loaded (bottom bar), please click 'Continue'

Thank you for your participation. We are testing different beer bottle designs on a number of attributes. If you have questions and would like to learn more about this investigation, please contact Alejandro Salgado alejandro.salgado@psy.oc.ac.uk. Don't forget to visit the below site to tell Profilic Academic you have completed the study.---{a href='https://prolificacademic.co.uk/submissions/55ab5adbfdf99b2dced04115/complete?cc=TB6DYR7P'}https://prolificacademic.co.uk/submissions/55ab5adbfdf99b2dced04115/complete?cc=TB6DYR7P{/a}.
